name: Spankbang
description: Spankbang video platform plugin for Grayjay with model search, recommendations, and improved creator profiles. Supports subscriptions, playlists, and watch history with authentication. To login: Play any video -> tap menu -> Page -> Login (easiest method).
author: GreyPluginDev

authentication.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 13; Pixel 7) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36

settings.name: Authentication Cookies
settings.description:
THREE WAYS TO LOGIN:

METHOD 1 - EASIEST (Works in Grayjay):
1. Play any video
2. Tap 3 dots menu -> Page
3. Tap login button on page
4. Login with your credentials
5. Grayjay will remember your session

METHOD 2 - Manual Cookie Entry:
1. Login to SpankBang in browser
2. Press F12 -> Application -> Cookies -> spankbang.com
3. Copy auth cookie value
4. Format: auth=YOUR_VALUE_HERE
5. Paste below and save

METHOD 3 - Auth Button:
Click Login button under Authentication section

Note: Methods 1 or 2 are most reliable. Cookie expires after 30 days.

2: Fixed subscriptions support with proper auth
Fixed playlists support with proper auth
Added watch history support with thumbnails and duration
Added cookie validation and expiry detection
3: Added multiple login methods for flexibility
EASIEST: Video -> 3 dots -> Page -> Login (works perfectly in Grayjay)
Manual cookie entry restored in settings
Full support for subscriptions, playlists, and watch history sync
Improved login instructions with working method
